SELECT
t.quoted_code quotedCode,t.enquiry_code enquiryCode,t.intention_code intentionCode,t.intention_supplier_code intentionSupplierCode,t.quoted_date quotedDate ,t.created quotedCreated ,m.intention_supplier_name intentionSupplierName,n.supplier_name supplierName, p.application_code applicationCode,p.application_status applicationStatus,(select u.real_name from pub_user u where u.user_id=p.CREATEBY) as applicationCreateby,a.INTENTION_NAME intentionName, p.oa_application_code oaApplicationCode,p.application_link oaApplicationUrl,p.oa_contacts oaContacts, c.centre_type_name centreTypeName,s.small_type_name smallTypeName,d.detail_type_name detailTypeName,f.fine_type_name fineTypeName, e.created enquiryCreated,(select u.real_name from pub_user u where u.user_id=e.createby) as enquiryCreateby,k.ACCESSORY_SAP_CODE accessorySapCode
count(1) AS record_count
FROM accessory_quoted_electronic t left join ACCESSORY_INTENTION_SUPPLIER m on t.intention_supplier_code=m.intention_supplier_code left join SUPPLIER n on t.intention_supplier_code=n.SUPPLIER_CODE left join ACCESSORY_INTENTION a on t.intention_code=a.intention_code left join ACCESSORY_ENQUIRY e on t.enquiry_code=e.enquiry_code left join APPLICATION_QUOTED q on t.quoted_code=q.quoted_code left join OA_APPLICATION p on q.application_code=p.application_code
left join MERCHANDISE_CENTRE_TYPE c on a.centre_type_code=c.centre_type_code left join MERCHANDISE_SMALL_TYPE s on a.small_type_code=s.small_type_code left join MERCHANDISE_DETAIL_TYPE d on a.detail_type_code=d.detail_type_code left join ACCESSORY_FINE_TYPE f on a.fine_type_code=f.fine_type_code left join WL_INFO k on t.intention_code=k.intention_code and t.QUOTED_CODE=k.QUOTED_CODE
1=1 and (p.application_type='ACCESSORY_FSPJJD' or p.application_type='' or p.application_type is null)
AND UPPER(t.quoted_code) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{quotedCode}||'%')
AND t.quoted_code = #{quotedCode}
AND UPPER(p.application_code) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{applicationCode}||'%')
AND DECODE(p.application_status,null,'W',p.application_status,p.application_status) =#{applicationStatus}
AND UPPER(t.enquiry_code) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{enquiryCode}||'%')
AND UPPER(t.intention_code) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{intentionCode}||'%')
AND UPPER(a.intention_name) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{intentionName}||'%')
AND ( UPPER(m.intention_supplier_code) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{intentionSupplierCode}||'%')
or UPPER(n.supplier_code) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{supplierCode}||'%') )
AND ( UPPER(m.intention_supplier_name) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{intentionSupplierName}||'%')
or UPPER(n.supplier_name) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{supplierName}||'%') )
AND UPPER(a.centre_type_code) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{centreTypeCode}||'%')
AND UPPER(a.small_type_code) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{smallTypeCode}||'%')
AND UPPER(a.detail_type_code) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{detailTypeCode}||'%')
AND UPPER(a.fine_type_code) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{fineTypeCodes}||'%')
AND convert(varchar,t.quoted_date,120) LIKE (#{quotedDate})
AND e.created>=#{enquiryCreated}
AND e.created< ( #{enquiryCreatedEnd}+ 1)
AND t.created>=#{quotedCreated}
AND t.created< (#{quotedCreatedEnd}+ 1)
AND a.created>=#{intentionCreated}
AND a.created< (#{intentionCreatedEnd}+ 1)
ORDER BY ${app_orderby}
ORDER BY p.application_code desc nulls last

SELECT
t.quoted_code quotedCode,t.enquiry_code enquiryCode,t.intention_code intentionCode,t.intention_supplier_code intentionSupplierCode,t.quoted_date quotedDate ,t.created quotedCreated ,m.intention_supplier_name intentionSupplierName,n.supplier_name supplierName, p.application_code applicationCode,p.application_status applicationStatus,p.CREATEBY applicationCreateby,a.INTENTION_NAME intentionName, c.centre_type_name centreTypeName,s.small_type_name smallTypeName,d.detail_type_name detailTypeName,f.fine_type_name fineTypeName, e.created enquiryCreated,e.createby enquiryCreateby,k.ACCESSORY_SAP_CODE accessorySapCode
count(1) AS record_count
FROM accessory_quoted_electronic t left join ACCESSORY_INTENTION_SUPPLIER m on t.intention_supplier_code=m.intention_supplier_code left join SUPPLIER n on t.intention_supplier_code=n.SUPPLIER_CODE left join ACCESSORY_INTENTION a on t.intention_code=a.intention_code left join ACCESSORY_ENQUIRY e on t.enquiry_code=e.enquiry_code left join APPLICATION_QUOTED q on t.quoted_code=q.quoted_code left join OA_APPLICATION p on q.application_code=p.application_code
left join MERCHANDISE_CENTRE_TYPE c on a.centre_type_code=c.centre_type_code left join MERCHANDISE_SMALL_TYPE s on a.small_type_code=s.small_type_code left join MERCHANDISE_DETAIL_TYPE d on a.detail_type_code=d.detail_type_code left join ACCESSORY_FINE_TYPE f on a.fine_type_code=f.fine_type_code left join WL_INFO k on t.intention_code=k.intention_code and t.QUOTED_CODE=k.QUOTED_CODE
1=1
AND t.quoted_code = #{quotedCode}
ORDER BY ${app_orderby}
ORDER BY t.created DESC
